column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I'm not one to give out 5-star ratings easily
column2: but Lou Malnati's is definitely deserving.  Planning a trip to Chicago
column3: I've realized that there is not one definitive "Chicago deep dish" pizza place.  Everyone you talk to has a different opinion
column4: and every place has tons of reviews that say "this place is good
column5: but it's nothing compared to so-and-so".  Ultimately
column6: I figure you just have to keep coming back to Chicago and trying new places until you find the one for you.
